lines.text: Mexican Americans / love education / so they go to night school / and take Spanish / and get a B.

[seeing a jar with a yellowish fluid inside]
Hey, it's about time man. Hey, what do you got man? Give me some.
Give me a drink, man. C'mon man, give me a drink!
What are you doing with pee?

No man, last week I was supposed to bring some in, you know? and I forgot the wash the jar out first. so they see all that mayonnaise floating around in there, and they think I'm on some kind of weird drug again!
And I'm really going to fuck with his mind this time.
I had my sister pee in it.
Shit, man, I'm gonna be late for work again. That's the fifth time this week, and it's only Tuesday, man.

[to Cheech]
Hey, Fella, you need a pass.

[Cheech is covered in ashes after the car explosion]
Oh, uh... I'm with the Towering Inferno, man.
[after shifting gasoline that has spilt on their clothes, Chong tries to light a joint]
Hey I don't think you better light it in here, man.
Man, if you had a second brain, it would die of loneliness, man.
I dig it, man. It's good. But you know, while you were singing that, I came up with another song, man.
Yeah. It's like the same thing, only different.
You wanna come over to my place? Okay. I'll be here with balls on.
Somebody ripped off the thing I ripped off!

[to Cheech after leaving in a van]
Hey, Fella, your pass?
Pass, oh thanks a lot man.
Holy sheep shit! It's guitar heaven!
Want me to teach you some Spanish, man?
When you see a friend, you say, hey, how's it going, pendejo?
Oh, it means my really good friend.
How's it going, pend... Pen... how was that, again?
Cheech! Hey, you old pile of horse shit! How are you? God damn, you got ugly! How ya doing, man?
I haven't seen you in ten years, man!
Oh, hey, Ching! Good to meet you!

[waiting on date to arrive]
Man, hurry up, bitch. I got lots of shit to do. Shit. If that bitch doesn't hurry up and get here, I'll have to wait some more.

[on phone with police]
Look, this is the real thing this time! There are two crazies running around tearing the place up! I already told you our location! ERRRGH! Well, what are they doing, walking over here? Look, I think they're Iranians!... okay, thanks very much.
Hey, you guys look a little familiar to me!
Ha, ha, ha. I'm the comedian. I'll tell the jokes, if you don't mind! If you think it's so easy, why don't you come up here and do it?
Yeah, go up there and tell a joke!
That's right! You come up here and do it!
Fuck this. I'm going somewhere else. Hey, hey, here!
[gives Red the finger and storms off]
You're driving like an idiot, man.
I just can't get used to these automatics, man.
Yeah, they are real complicated, aren't they?
Hey, that's a pretty nice car, man. Better get it back to the circus before they find out it's gone.
